metadata.title: CVE-2024-46694 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: avoid using null object of framebufferInstead of using state->fb->obj[0] directly, get object from framebufferby calling drm_gem_fb_get_obj() and return error code when object isnull to avoid using null object of framebuffer.(cherry picked from commit 73dd0ad9e5dad53766ea3e631303430116f834b3)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
